statements: SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites
SELECT site_name, location, schedule_day FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites
SELECT site_id, site_name, schedule_time FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites WHERE location = 'City Center'
SELECT site_id, schedule_day FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites WHERE schedule_time > '10:00:00'
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY site_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT site_name, schedule_day, schedule_time FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites WHERE schedule_day = 'Monday'
SELECT site_name, location FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites WHERE site_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '08:00' AND '12:00' ORDER BY site_id DESC
SELECT site_name, schedule_day FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites WHERE location LIKE 'San%' ORDER BY site_id ASC
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionSites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM WasteCollectionSites WHERE site_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM CollectionSchedules WHERE collection_day = 'Monday';
SELECT site_name, collection_time FROM WasteCollectionSites JOIN CollectionSchedules ON WasteCollectionSites.site_id = CollectionSchedules.site_id;
SELECT site_name, COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_schedules FROM WasteCollectionSites JOIN CollectionSchedules ON WasteCollectionSites.site_id = CollectionSchedules.site_id GROUP BY site_name;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionSites;
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM WasteCollectionSites ORDER BY site_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CollectionSchedules WHERE collection_day = 'Monday' AND site_id = 1;
SELECT site_id, site_name, site_location FROM WasteCollectionSites WHERE site_id > 5;
SELECT s.site_name, c.collection_day FROM WasteCollectionSites s JOIN CollectionSchedules c ON s.site_id = c.site_id ORDER BY s.site_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_schedules ORDER BY day_of_week DESC;
SELECT site_name, capacity FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_records WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM biodegradable_waste_collection_sites WHERE capacity > 100;

SELECT schedule_id, site_name, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM waste_collection_schedules JOIN biodegradable_waste_collection_sites ON waste_collection_schedules.site_id = biodegradable_waste_collection_sites.site_id;

SELECT record_id, collection_date, collected_quantity, site_name FROM waste_collection_records JOIN waste_collection_schedules ON waste_collection_records.schedule_id = waste_collection_schedules.schedule_id JOIN biodegradable_waste_collection_sites ON waste_collection_schedules.site_id = biodegradable_waste_collection_sites.site_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_records WHERE collected_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM collection_sites;
SELECT site_name, city, capacity FROM collection_sites WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM collection_schedules ORDER BY day_of_week DESC;
SELECT waste_type, weight FROM collected_waste WHERE weight > 100;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM waste_collection_employees WHERE employee_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012';
SELECT * FROM collection_sites;
SELECT site_name, address, city FROM collection_sites WHERE city='New York';
SELECT site_name, capacity FROM collection_sites WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT site_name, address, city, capacity FROM collection_sites WHERE city='Los Angeles' AND capacity < 5000;
SELECT schedule_id, day_of_week, collection_time FROM collection_schedules ORDER BY day_of_week DESC;
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableSites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM BiodegradableSites WHERE site_capacity > 100;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_date, collection_time FROM CollectionSchedules ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT waste_type_name, waste_description FROM WasteTypes WHERE waste_type_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT assignment_id, site_id, collector_id, assignment_date FROM SiteAssignments WHERE assignment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableSites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM BiodegradableSites WHERE site_capacity > 100;
SELECT site_name, site_capacity, assignment_date FROM BiodegradableSites JOIN SiteAssignments ON BiodegradableSites.site_id = SiteAssignments.site_id;
SELECT * FROM CollectionSchedules ORDER BY collection_date DESC;

SELECT site_name, waste_type_name, collection_date FROM BiodegradableSites JOIN WasteCollectionHistory ON BiodegradableSites.site_id = WasteCollectionHistory.site_id JOIN WasteTypes ON WasteCollectionHistory.waste_type_id = WasteTypes.waste_type_id;
